name: ucsd-free-food
description: Frontend for UCSD free food event calendar (now on GitHub Pages because I hit the Vercel free plan limits)

scripts.build: cp -a static/. dist/ && esbuild --bundle src/index.tsx --outdir=dist --minify && find dist/ -type f | sed 's/dist\//https:\/\/sheeptester.github.io\/ucsd-classrooms\//' > dist/sitemap.txt

author: SheepTester
